body: As far as I can see this only affects the attribute case, but I don't think this is necessary. Instead of going through the powerset and blowing up the number of cases we could just alter the way we parse attribute values, similarly to what we do with positional args. This has both better complexity, and doesn't require this extra argument with pretty annoying semantics.
